meta_description: For over 220 years, PEM has been dedicated to collecting, preserving, and showcasing compelling artwork throughout history and from around the world.

collections_text:
# Welcome to the Peabody Essex Museum!

Located in the heart of downtown Salem, Massachusetts, the Peabody Essex Museum is Salem’s museum of art and culture, with exhibitions that explore everything from witch trials history to nature and science. See what’s going on [this weekend](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114014931/https://www.pem.org/events/this-weekend).
